mapper.insert: insert into album(albumname, albumtype, albumdate, albumgenre, artist_artistnumber, albumimg, 19check, albumcontent values(#{albumName}, #{albumType}, #{albumDate}, #{albumGenre}, #{artistNumber}, #{albumImg}, #{ageLimit}, #{albumContent})
mapper.select: select a.albumname as albumname, ar.artistname as artistname, a.albumdate as albumdate from album as a inner join artist as ar on a.artist_artistnumber=ar.artistnumber order by albumdate asc Limit #{limit}
